summary: The story takes place at a British plantation in Africa where Tondelayo entices all the Brits, especially Harry Witzel.
cast: Hedy Lamarr|Walter Pidgeon|Frank Morgan|Richard Carlson|Reginald Owen|Henry O'Neill|Bramwell Fletcher|Clyde Cook|Leigh Whipper|Oscar Polk|Darby Jones|Richard Ainley|Ed Allen|John Burton|Jim Davis|Delos Jewkes|Martin Wilkins
title: White Cargo
